children.text: As a boutique cosmetic manufacturer, we limit the volume of our production to insure our products remain fresh and active. The process is magic. The maximum purchase limit during the holidays, due to increased shopping volumes, is 5 of each available product per individual until we educate and certify new authorized dealers of the Yater Actives line. Prospective Boutiques who wish to resell should email us directly by clicking here to fill out our dealer application for vendor form. This product will only be available on line though our site or through our certified vendors to assure that your product is authentic and has not been reproduced or diluted by evil resellers."
We can only ship within to United States addresses (not Hawaii or Alaska) at this time. Please fill out our form below for International vendor distribution inquiries. We will respond promptly.
